about_the_game:
Trash Bunny House is a first-person exploration horror action game. You work as a writer on the edge working at a publishing company and you are heading towards an abandoned factory deep within the mountains. The abandoned factory was an old manufacturing site for animatronics meant for an amusement park. However, during manufacturing many unexplained fatal incidents occurred and it closed down. Then, after it was supposed to have been shut down, a tip-off came from someone who reported witnessing the animatronics often inside the factory. Take as many photos for the scoop as you can and come back alive.

Don't miss any chances with your shutter:

When you point your camera at something that could be a scoop, you will get a notification of the chance to use your shutter. Because there may be danger the second you point your camera at something and it will be a precious moment you will not get again to take a photo, when the chance notification icon comes up, release the shutter immediately.

Play time:

1-2 hours.

Autosave system:

It will autosave at set points.

Multi-ending system:

If you are successful in taking photos for your scoop, you will gain points. Based on the amount of points, the ending will change. Number of endings: four.

Regarding posting videos of the game and live streaming:

You do not need permission in advance. I permit you to post videos of the game and to live stream.
detailed_description:
Trash Bunny House is a first-person exploration horror action game. You work as a writer on the edge working at a publishing company and you are heading towards an abandoned factory deep within the mountains. The abandoned factory was an old manufacturing site for animatronics meant for an amusement park. However, during manufacturing many unexplained fatal incidents occurred and it closed down. Then, after it was supposed to have been shut down, a tip-off came from someone who reported witnessing the animatronics often inside the factory. Take as many photos for the scoop as you can and come back alive.

Don't miss any chances with your shutter:

When you point your camera at something that could be a scoop, you will get a notification of the chance to use your shutter. Because there may be danger the second you point your camera at something and it will be a precious moment you will not get again to take a photo, when the chance notification icon comes up, release the shutter immediately.

Play time:

1-2 hours.

Autosave system:

It will autosave at set points.

Multi-ending system:

If you are successful in taking photos for your scoop, you will gain points. Based on the amount of points, the ending will change. Number of endings: four.

Regarding posting videos of the game and live streaming:

You do not need permission in advance. I permit you to post videos of the game and to live stream.
name: Trash Bunny House

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790 CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce RTX2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Animatronics for an amusement park, whose production stopped due to frequently occurring and unexplained fatal accidents. We got a tip-off that some remain in an abandoned rural factory. Our publishing company will leave this up to you. Take good photos for the scoop.
